npp-plugins.description: Detects indention (tab or spaces) and auto adjust Tab key on-the-fly.
npp-plugins.author: Mike Tzou (Chocobo1)

npp-plugins.description: Advanced compare tool based on the well-known Compare-plugin by Ty Landercasper and Jean-Sebastien Leroy.
npp-plugins.author: Pavel Nedev

npp-plugins.description: Fixed Width Data Visualizer adds Excel-like features for fixed-width data files in Notepad++. Displays cursor position data. Foldable Record Blocks; Hop & Jump to specific fields. Field Copy & Field Paste. Data Extraction. Builtin dialogs to configure file-type, record-type & fields; and themes & colors. Automatic File Type Detection. Handles homogenous, mixed & multi-line records. Full Multi-byte character support. Darkmode enabled.
npp-plugins.author: Shridhar Kumar

npp-plugins.description: A plugin to navigate to a specified line and (byte-based or character-based) column position. Will also display character byte code, UTF-8 byte sequence & Unicode code point at cursor position. Darkmode enabled. Command line options.
npp-plugins.author: Shridhar Kumar

npp-plugins.description: Hex editor. Some reported issues, however many bugs fixed in latest release.
npp-plugins.author: Jens Lorenz

npp-plugins.description: Implements several main functionalities defined in MIME (Multipurpose Internet Mail Extensions).
npp-plugins.author: Don HO

npp-plugins.description: Enables multi-string replacement, storage of search/replace patterns in files, processing of delimited data columns, support for rectangular selection, and export to bash scripts.
npp-plugins.author: Thomas Knoefel

npp-plugins.description: Notepad++ Plugin Demo is written from Notepad++ Plugin Template to demonstrate the usage of plugin API.
npp-plugins.author: Don HO

npp-plugins.description: Template for making plugin development as easy and simple as possible. Four steps and it's done.
npp-plugins.author: Don HO

npp-plugins.description: ASCII<->Hex converter.
npp-plugins.author: Don HO

npp-plugins.description: True WYSIWYG exporter. Allows you not only to save your source code as an HTML/RTF file, but also to copy your source code in the clipboard in RTF/HTML format, so you can paste it into your word processor (Openoffice.org Writer, LibreOffice Writer, Abiword, MS Word) to get the same visual effect.
Adds Windows 7 jump list support.
npp-plugins.author: ahvgeezer

npp-plugins.description: Allows the same document to be edited in real time on two different computers. Only needs a network connection between the two.
npp-plugins.author: Harrybharry

npp-plugins.description: Adds the possibility to add code snippets to the current document by selecting them from a simple list.
npp-plugins.author: Frank Fesevur

npp-plugins.description: Pass any selected text to any command line program as input and take the output (the result of program) to replace the selected text.
npp-plugins.author: Don HO

npp-plugins.description: Encrypt/decrypt whole documents or selected text with your own key. Useful for storing sensitive information like logins that you don't want lying around in a plaintext file.
npp-plugins.author: Dominic Tobias

npp-plugins.description: Auto copy selected text to clipboard. You can automatically copy selected text like in PuTTY (or similar) terminal application.
npp-plugins.author: Jakub Dvorak

npp-plugins.description: Session manager. IMPORTANT: If you are upgrading from a version older than 1.2 then, immediately after the upgrade, open the Settings dialog and reconfigure your settings.
npp-plugins.author: Mike Foster

npp-plugins.description: No kidding, Notepad++ speaks now. With SpeechPlugin, you can make Notepad++ dictate your text or source code. Of course, speakers are necessary.
npp-plugins.author: Jim Xochellis

npp-plugins.description: Automatically scans the open document and adds all "TODO:*" items to your task list, a window pane docked on the right. Double-clicking an item in the list will take you to that line in the code.
npp-plugins.author: blitowitz

npp-plugins.description:
Hopefully a decent URL Encoder and Decoder plug-in for Notepad++ which helps to make developer's life easier by providing facility to encode/decode the URL within Notepad++. 

How it works:
1. Configure setting from menu (Plugins->URL Plugin->URL Plugin Settings). It is not mandatory, but recommended.
2. Select text/URL which you want to encode/decode.
3. Perform your task via Plugins->URL Plugin->Encode/Decode URL.
npp-plugins.author: Rajendra Singh

npp-plugins.description: JSON viewer that displays the selected JSON string in a tree view.
npp-plugins.author: Kapil Ratnani, Rajendra Singh

npp-plugins.description:
Javascript plugin.
 * Douglas Crockford's JSMin algorithm to minimize javascript code.
 * My own algorithm to format javascript code.
 * A JSON data viewer. This JSON data viewer can handle >10MB JSON file easily.
 * Support 64bit Notepad++ (from version 1.20.0).
Really helpful to javascript coder on Notepad++ and really easy to use it.
Made in China.
npp-plugins.author: Sun Junwen

npp-plugins.description:
Automatically save the currently open files based on a timer schedule and/or upon the application losing focus.
The plugin offers several options to save the current (or all the files), selecting only the named ones, accessible through an options dialog box.
npp-plugins.author: Franco Stellari

npp-plugins.description:
Allows loading a language specific help file (CHM, HLP, PDF) and search for the keyword under the cursor.
The latest version allows showing the help files as menu entries or in the context menu.
npp-plugins.author: Franco Stellari

npp-plugins.description: Adds icons to the main menu, tab menu, context menu, and the tabs themselves.
npp-plugins.author: Franco Stellari

npp-plugins.description: Open files based on the selected text. A typical applications is 'include' files of may types of programs. Another applications is to open Matlab functions. Can be customized for different languages based on the open file extension. Multiple search folders may be specified along with multiple extensions.
npp-plugins.author: Franco Stellari

npp-plugins.description: Execute the currently open file, based on its shell association. Also allows opening an explorer or command shell at the file location. Options are available to save the current file (or all files) before execution. The executed file can be run in foreground, background, or hidden mode. Context menu entries and tool bar icons are available.
npp-plugins.author: Franco Stellari

npp-plugins.description: Helps people who like to use Notepad++ for jotting quick notes. Instead of using unnamed 'new ?' files, this plugins allows to quickly create new empty files in a folder of choice. The file names may be custom generated using a mask and may contain details such as the user name, date, and time of creation so that unique files may be generated. Additionally, the plugin allows to load exiting notes in the folder of choice, save existing files as a note, and open the last saved note quickly. Please refer to the Options dialog box for more details. It is strongly recommended to use this plugin in combination with AutoSave to make sure that you never loose a note.
npp-plugins.author: Franco Stellari

npp-plugins.description: Allows setting the main Notepad++ window as a topmost window so it can stay on top of other windows even when it is not active. Syncs with Notepad++'s own stay on top functionality and allows to remember the setting between restarts as well as to show a toolbar button.
npp-plugins.author: Franco Stellari
